title: I've Been
name: I've Been
description:
A Map by Vario

Points on the Globe where I've stayed or simply been.

properties.name: Almada
properties.description: Posted by VariospainSpent three day here for a G12 conference. Beautiful beaches

properties.name: Atlanta
properties.description: Posted by VariospainOne of my Favorite cities. Been there twice. Stayed with Tyree.

properties.name: Badajoz
properties.description: Posted by VariospainGreat people have a lot of friends here.

properties.name: Birmingham
properties.description: Posted by VarioBirmingham

properties.name: Bogata
properties.description: Posted by VariospainGreat place. Great people. Nice city. Beautiful women.

properties.name: Boston
properties.description: Posted by VariospainNice city. Nice place to hang out.

properties.name: Cotonou
properties.description: Posted by VariospainBeautiful people. Beautiful city. Beautiful country. Great food. I was there about ten days

properties.name: Dublin
properties.description: Posted by VariospainFlew Air Lingus to Madrid once - interesting flight. Stayed in the Dublin airport for about five hours. I would love to go back and check the city out.

properties.name: Granada
properties.description: Posted by VariospainGreat place. Nice vaction spot.

properties.name: Home 1 Chicago
properties.description: Posted by VariospainChicago. Born and raised. Best city in the world!!!

properties.name: Home 3 Caceres
properties.description: Posted by VariospainLived for a year.

properties.name: Indianapolis
properties.description: Posted by VariospainHome to Aunt KK and some Great Aunts and Uncles.

properties.name: London
properties.description: Posted by VariospainWas here for a couple of hours. I got to see some of the terrain as I went from Heathrow to Gatwick. I think that\'s how you spell them.

properties.name: Louisville
properties.description: Posted by VariospainKentucky Kingdom. Years ago. With Aunt KK and the church group from Indianapolis.

properties.name: Madrid
properties.description: Posted by VariospainBeautiful city. Loved it. Been there several times now. Good mix of old and new architecture.

properties.name: Merida
properties.description: Posted by VariospainBeen here several times for several different things

properties.name: Montgomery
properties.description: Posted by VarioBirmingham

properties.name: Nashville
properties.description: Posted by VariospainBeen there once for one of DeArrius\' games.

properties.name: Naval Moral
properties.description: Posted by VariospainBeen here three times. Small town. Its on our way to Garganta de Oiya.

properties.name: New Jersey
properties.description: Posted by VariospainInteresting place. Not sure exact what area I was in but I would like to go back to see more of it.

properties.name: New Orleans
properties.description: Posted by VarioBirmingham

properties.name: New York
properties.description: Posted by VariospainNew Years Eve. 2004-5. Great time. Wasn\'t what I expected. Beautiful state.

properties.name: Paris
properties.description: Posted by VariospainOne of my favorite cities. Beautiful. Great food. Went there to visit Vanessa in Versailles. Stay in small quaint hotel in for about 7-10 days.

properties.name: Philadelphia
properties.description: Posted by VariospainStay there a night not sure exactly what it has to offer but I most definitely have to back because it is like the birth place of Neo Soul. I may be wrong but there are sure a lot of artist from there.

properties.name: Sevilla
properties.description: Posted by VariospainBeen here twice once with Alfonso and Angela. And once as a stop on our way to Granada

properties.name: St. Louis
properties.description: Posted by VariospainAunt KK
